Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 2

+13 vs AC; 1d8+4 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+13 vs AC; 1d6+3 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack and a claw attack.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee attack, at-will

The dragon attacks the target; targets the enemy that missed it; +13 vs AC; 1d6+4 damage.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

+11 vs Fortitude; 2d6+5 necrotic damage, and the target loses one healing surge and is weakened (save ends). Aftereffect: The target's necrotic resistance is negated until the end of the encounter. Miss: Half damage, and the target does not lose a healing surge.

Encounter âœ¦ Necrotic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +11 vs Will; the target is dazed until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ Zone

Minor 1/Round

Area burst 2 within 10

Sustain Minor

This power creates a zone of darkness that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon. Any creature entirely within the area (except the dragon) is blinded.
The shadow dragon deals an extra 1d6 damage against a target it has combat advantage against.

At-Will âœ¦ Teleportation

Move

The shadow walker turns invisible until the end of its next turn or until it attacks when it moves 3 or more squares on its turn.

Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Intimidate +9, Stealth +15Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 17 | Insight 17
